title: Campaign finance reports show candidate fundraising, spending ahead of primary - Salisbury Post - Salisbury Post
content: Campaign finance reports show candidate fundraising, spending ahead of primary - Salisbury Post  Salisbury Post
description: By Elisabeth Strillacci & Ben Stansell news@salisburypost.com SALISBURY — Finance reports released last week show how candidates in competitive local races raised funds and spent money in the months leading up to Tuesday’s primary election. The 2022 first quarter reports include all campaign finance activity among candidates from Jan. 1 to April 30. Reports were […]
